Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Arshea]{Arshea}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Casandalee]{Casandalee}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Gruhastha]{Gruhastha}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Irori]{Irori}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Narriseminek]{Narriseminek}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Otolmens]{Otolmens}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Pillars of Knowledge]{Pillars of Knowledge}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Ragdya]{Ragdya}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Shei]{Shei}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Shizuru]{Shizuru}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.The Godclaw]{The Godclaw}

Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Perfected Mind]{Perfected Mind}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Perfected Form]{Perfected Form}

You strive to perfect your mind, body, and spirit.
name: Perfection Domain
